root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 4-2-1, translated into en
root.data: Children under 5 years of age development is the first step towards development throughout life. Investing in the development of children under 5 years of age is the most important and effective investment a country can make to improve the health, education and productivity of adults to build human capital. and promote sustainable development. Investment in the development of children under 5 years old is a good and reasonable indicator for the development of the country.
